类 HBaseAdmin.TableFuture<V>

 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
protected abstract static class HBaseAdmin.TableFuture<V>
extends HBaseAdmin.ProcedureFuture<V>

      • postOperationResult

        protected V postOperationResult(V result,
                                long deadlineTs)
                         throws IOException,
                                TimeoutException
        从类复制的说明: HBaseAdmin.ProcedureFuture
        Called after the operation is completed and the result fetched. this allows to perform extra steps after the procedure is completed. it allows to apply transformations to the result that will be returned by get().
        覆盖:
        postOperationResult 在类中 HBaseAdmin.ProcedureFuture<V>
        参数:
        result - the result of the procedure
        deadlineTs - the timestamp after which this method should throw a TimeoutException
        返回:
        the result of the procedure, which may be the same as the passed one
        抛出:
        IOException
        TimeoutException

      • postOperationFailure

        protected V postOperationFailure(IOException exception,
                                 long deadlineTs)
                          throws IOException,
                                 TimeoutException
        从类复制的说明: HBaseAdmin.ProcedureFuture
        Called after the operation is terminated with a failure. this allows to perform extra steps after the procedure is terminated. it allows to apply transformations to the result that will be returned by get(). The default implementation will rethrow the exception
        覆盖:
        postOperationFailure 在类中 HBaseAdmin.ProcedureFuture<V>
        参数:
        exception - the exception got from fetching the result
        deadlineTs - the timestamp after which this method should throw a TimeoutException
        返回:
        the result of the procedure, which may be the same as the passed one
        抛出:
        IOException
        TimeoutException
